title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1648-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1648-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the periodic subsidies paid by the State
to a local agency under a contract for State aid is to assist in achieving and
maintaining the low rent character of a project, in accordance with the Public

Housing Law. The State subsidy is therefore paid against the operating deficit
of a project incurred subsequent to the date of substantial
completion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1648-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
